text: b. Working collaboratively with other nearby developers and the council. DELIVERING THE LOCAL PLAN 5. The council will secure financial contributions towards coordination and integration of development activity to help address the cumulative impact of construction from sites across the borough. 6. Development is required to employ the highest standards of sustainable construction, including: a. sustainable construction methods, such as the use of sustainably sourced, low embodied carbon and recycled materials; and b. the use of demolished material from the development site, where practicable, in order to minimise the transportation of waste, reduce carbon dioxide emissions, and to facilitate the transition to a circular economy.
